rooms.description: North-facing entrance lobby with a minimalistic reception area and ample natural light, ensuring Vastu compliance.
Open space living area with direct view to the balcony; designed with Brutalist aesthetics featuring exposed concrete structures and raw materials. Natural north lighting enhances the space.
Compact, yet functional kitchen integrated within the living area. Utilitarian design with industrial elements.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony for relaxation and improved air circulation; designed in Brutalist style with raw finishes.

openings.location: Adjacent to master bedroom, north side
